what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: R package accompany Advent Code website associated template .

what: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
title: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
text: Get puzzle input Advent Code website given day year save file. file saved current working directory relative path "./YYYY/day/DD/input", YYYY value year parameter DD value day parameter. path echoes URL structure Advent Code website.

title: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
text: day integer 1 25 year integer representing year. Defaults current year.

title: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
text: Returns, invisibly, character string absolute path input file.

title: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input
text: function assumes account Advent Code website. function work, must set ADVENT_SESSION environment variable .Renviron file. guidance find session token, see https://github.com/dgrtwo/adventdrob/tree/main#installation. session token, can set environment variable usethis::edit_r_environ(). function adapted https://github.com/dgrtwo/adventdrob/blob/main/R/input.R.

title: Get and save the puzzle input — aoc_get_input

what: Read input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
title: Read input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
text: Read input vector

title: Read input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
Read input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
text: day integer 1 25 year integer representing year. Defaults current year. mode Character string. One 'character' 'numeric'. Default 'character'.

title: Read input as a vector — aoc_input_vector
text: vector containing puzzle input day year

title: Read input as a vector — aoc_input_vector

what: Get URLs from the Advent of Code website — aoc_url
title: Get URLs from the Advent of Code website — aoc_url
text: Get URL Advent Code website puzzle puzzle input given day year.
